standard: Use common terminal commands, such as cd and pwd
Understand and use four basic math operators and exponentiation operator (**)
Cast variables and literals between data types
Debug 'TypeError: unsupported operand types for +' and 'TypeError: can only concatenate str(not int) to str' errors
Debug 'SyntaxError: unexpected EOF while parsing' error
Understand and use the boolean data type
Understand and use the logical operators `not`, `and`, `or`
Understand how to short-circuit boolean operators
Read and write code that branches using `if`, `elif`, and `else` statements
Understand how to read and write nested conditionals
